评论详情: The black is really beautiful to look at but I’m scared to rip it. The letters on the inside came with some gray fabric attached that I picked off but other than that no true complaints on the letters.  I also bought green it’s a bit more cropped and it’s made better.

The shirts were beautiful & well made. Keep in mind that they are fitted. Only thing I didn’t like is that the there were some loose strings but it was nothing that couldn’t be fixed with some scissors.
